title: Marketing Manager
summary: We are seeking an experienced Marketing Manager to develop and implement marketing strategies that increase brand awareness and drive customer engagement. The ideal candidate will have experience in digital marketing, campaign management, and market research.
duties: Develop and execute marketing strategies and campaigns across multiple channels. Manage a team of marketing specialists. Analyze market trends and competitor activities. Create and maintain marketing budget. Collaborate with sales team to align marketing efforts with sales goals. Measure and report on performance of marketing campaigns.
skills: Digital marketing, Brand management, Marketing strategy, Campaign management, Social media marketing, Content marketing, Email marketing, SEO/SEM, Market research, Analytics, Budget management, Team leadership, Communication
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or related field. 5+ years of experience in marketing with at least 2 years in a management role. Proven track record of successful marketing campaigns. Strong understanding of marketing principles and best practices. Excellent leadership, communication, and presentation skills.
